docs.title: mri_gtmpvc
docs.description: mri_gtmpvc performs partial volume correction on PET data using anatomical segmentation.

docs.title: Input volume
docs.description: Input volume: source data to PVC

docs.title: Frame
docs.description: Only process 0-based frame F from input volume

docs.title: PSF FWHM
docs.description: Scanner PSF FWHM in mm

docs.title: Segmentation file
docs.description: Anatomical segmentation to define regions for GTM

docs.title: Registration file
docs.description: LTA registration file that maps PET to anatomical

docs.title: Regheader flag
docs.description: Assume input and seg share scanner space

docs.title: Reg Identity flag
docs.description: Assume that input is in anatomical space

docs.title: Output directory
docs.description: Output directory

docs.title: Mask volume
docs.description: Ignore areas outside of the mask (in input vol space)

docs.title: Auto mask
docs.description: Automatically compute mask with FWHM and threshold

docs.title: No reduce field of view
docs.description: Do not reduce FoV to encompass mask

docs.title: Reduce FoV to odd dimensions
docs.description: Reduce FoV to encompass mask but force nc=nr and ns to be odd

docs.title: Contrast matrix
docs.description: Univariate contrast to test

docs.title: Default segmentation merge
docs.description: Default schema for merging ROIs

docs.title: Merge hypointensites
docs.description: Merge left and right hypointensites into ROI

docs.title: Merge cerebellum WM gyri
docs.description: Cerebellum WM gyri back into cerebellum WM

docs.title: Tissue-type reduce
docs.description: Reduce segmentation to that of a tissue type

docs.title: Replace segmentation IDs
docs.description: Replace seg Id1 with seg Id2

docs.title: Replace file
docs.description: File with a list of Ids to replace

docs.title: Rescale
docs.description: Specify reference region(s) used to rescale (default is pons)

docs.title: No rescale
docs.description: Do not global rescale such that mean of reference region is scaleref

docs.title: Scale reference value
docs.description: Scale such that mean in reference region is refval

docs.title: Color table
docs.description: Specify color table explicitly

docs.title: Default color table
docs.description: Use default color table

docs.title: Tissue type update
docs.description: Changes tissue type of VentralDC, BrainStem, and Pons to be SubcortGM

docs.title: Lateralization
docs.description: Lateralize tissue types

docs.title: No TFE correction
docs.description: Do not correct for tissue fraction effect

docs.title: No PVC
docs.description: Turns off PVC entirely

docs.title: Tissue fraction resolution
docs.description: Set the tissue fraction resolution parameter (default is 0.5)

docs.title: RBV PVC
docs.description: Perform RBV PVC

docs.title: RBV resolution
docs.description: Set RBV voxel resolution

docs.title: Mueller-Gaertner PVC
docs.description: Perform Mueller-Gaertner PVC

docs.title: MG Reference Cerebral WM
docs.description: Set MG RefIds to 2 and 41

docs.title: MG Reference Lobes WM
docs.description: Set MG RefIds to those for lobes when using wm subseg

docs.title: GLM-based MG PVC
docs.description: GLM-based Mueller-Gaertner PVC

docs.title: KM Reference TAC
docs.description: Compute reference TAC for KM as mean of given RefIds

docs.title: KM HiBinding TAC
docs.description: Compute HiBinding TAC for KM as mean of given RefIds

docs.title: Steady-state analysis
docs.description: Steady-state analysis spec blood plasma concentration, unit scale, and decay correction factor.

docs.title: Save X matrix
docs.description: Save X matrix in matlab4 format as X.mat

docs.title: Save y matrix
docs.description: Save y matrix in matlab4 format as y.mat

docs.title: Save beta matrix
docs.description: Save beta matrix in matlab4 format as beta.mat

docs.title: Save X0 matrix
docs.description: Save X0 matrix in matlab4 format as X0.mat

docs.title: Save rescaled input
docs.description: Saves rescaled input as input.rescaled.nii.gz

docs.title: Save residual error
docs.description: Saves residual error

docs.title: Save yhat
docs.description: Saves yhat

docs.title: Save yhat with noise
docs.description: Saves yhat with noise, seed < 0 for TOD

docs.title: Save yhat full FoV
docs.description: Saves yhat in full FoV (if FoV was reduced)

docs.title: Save yhat0
docs.description: Saves yhat prior to smoothing

docs.title: Synthesize volume
docs.description: Synthesize volume with gtmbeta as input

docs.title: Synthesize only
docs.description: Exit after doing synthesis (implies --synth-save)

docs.title: Synthesize save
docs.description: With --synth saves synthesized volume to outdir/synth.nii.gz

docs.title: Save text
docs.description: Save demeaned GTM values out to text files named after the seg

docs.title: Threads
docs.description: Use N threads (with Open MP)

docs.title: Max threads
docs.description: Use the maximum allowable number of threads for this computer

docs.title: Max threads minus one
docs.description: Use one less than the maximum allowable number of threads for this computer

docs.title: Subjects directory
docs.description: Specify SUBJECTS_DIR

docs.title: VG threshold
docs.description: Threshold for LTAconcat error

docs.title: Diagnostic level
docs.description: Set diagnostic level

docs.title: Debug
docs.description: Turn on debugging

docs.title: Check options
docs.description: Don't run anything, just check options and exit

docs.title: Help
docs.description: Print out information on how to use this program

docs.title: Version
docs.description: Print out version and exit

docs.title: mri_gtmpvc
docs.description: mri_gtmpvc performs partial volume correction on PET data using anatomical segmentation.
